[Turing completeness -------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/turing-completeness)

![Image 1](https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/badc11d4cb406de53b5b12b648bb8177?d=identicon)

Luka Kurnjek 07/23/2025

[Turing](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Turing)[Programming language](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Programming%20language)[+ 1](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary)

Any system of data-manipulation rules is said to be Turing-complete if it can be used to simulate any Turing machine (devised by English mathematician and computer scientist Alan Turing). This means that this system can recognize and decode other data manipulation rule sets, allowing it to be used to solve any computational problem. In terms of programming ...

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Single-client dependency ------------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/single-client-dependency)

![Image 2](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/102920475?v=4)

Ivan Irakoze 06/20/2025

[cardano](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=cardano)

a blockchain's reliance on one node architecture. 

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Plinth ------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/plinth)

![Image 3](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/102920475?v=4)

Ivan Irakoze 03/05/2025

[plinth](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=plinth)

The rebranded Plutus Tx compiler in Cardano's ecosystem that enhances smart contract development. Plinth simplifies contract creation and optimizes on- and off-chain interactions, demonstrating Cardano's commitment to improved developer tooling. 

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Hyperledger Identus -------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/hyperledger-identus)

![Image 4](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/102920475?v=4)

Ivan Irakoze 03/05/2025

[hyperledger identus](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=hyperledger%20identus)

A Linux Foundation project under the Decentralized Trust initiative that provides components for building self-sovereign identity (SSI) solutions. Identus enhances security, privacy, and efficiency in blockchain-based identity management. 

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Edinburgh Decentralization Index (EDI) --------------------------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/edinburgh-decentralization-index-edi)

![Image 5](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/102920475?v=4)

Ivan Irakoze 03/05/2025

[Edinburgh Decentralization Index](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Edinburgh%20Decentralization%20Index)

A framework developed by the University of Edinburgh and Input Output Global (IOG) that measures and analyzes decentralization levels across blockchains. The EDI employs various metrics and presents data through a publicly accessible interactive dashboard. 

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Blockfrost ----------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/blockfrost)

![Image 6](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/102920475?v=4)

Ivan Irakoze 03/05/2025

[Blockfrost](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Blockfrost)

An API service for Cardano developers that simplifies blockchain access through tools for querying data, interacting with smart contracts, and building decentralized applications (DApps). 

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Decentralized physical infrastructure network (DePIN) -----------------------------------------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/decentralized-physical-infrastructure-network-depin)

![Image 7](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/102920475?v=4)

Ivan Irakoze 03/05/2025

[DePIN](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=DePIN)

A framework that decentralizes physical infrastructure like servers and hardware, enabling operation without centralized providers. This approach enhances resilience and reduces costs in decentralized ecosystems. 

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Working groups --------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/working-groups)

![Image 8](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)[Working groups](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Working%20groups)

A working group brings experts and committed community members together to discuss a specific topic. Each group sets its own goals regarding solutions to drive ecosystem success and adoption. Intersect is currently facilitating the creation and bootstrapping of these expert groups. The ultimate goal is community empowerment to self-mobilize and collaborate...

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Technical steering committee ----------------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/technical-steering-committee)

![Image 9](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[Technical steering committee](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Technical%20steering%20committee)[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)

Based at Intersect, the technical steering committee (TSC) is an advisory group that ensures Cardano's governance is founded upon sound technical awareness and best practices. The TSC will cover a broad spectrum of technical aspects of Cardano’s network and form working groups focused on particular domains. 

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[SanchoNet ---------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/sanchonet)

![Image 10](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[SanchoNet](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=SanchoNet)[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)

SanchoNet is the testnet for rolling out groundbreaking governance features for the Cardano blockchain, aligning with the comprehensive CIP-1694 specifications. SanchoNet is a vibrant, inclusive, and community-driven platform that stands apart from other testnets. Following a phased delivery roadmap, SanchoNet will expand to include a range of governance fea...

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Parameter committee -------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/parameter-committee)

![Image 11](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)[Parameter committee](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Parameter%20committee)

The parameter committee, initially bootstrapped by IOG, EMURGO, and the Cardano Foundation, along with members of the stake pool operator community, discusses all protocol parameters, including network, technical, and economic parameters, providing non-binding recommendations. 

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Minimum viable on-chain governance ----------------------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/minimum-viable-on-chain-governance)

![Image 12](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)[Minimum viable on-chain governance](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Minimum%20viable%20on-chain%20governance)

Minimum viable on-chain governance (MVG) defines the baseline rules, mechanisms, and entities necessary for ada holders to participate in governance. It aims to establish a foundation that is democratic, secure, and adaptable. 

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Intersect ---------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/intersect)

![Image 13](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)[Intersect](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Intersect)

Intersect is a member-based organization at the helm of the continuity and future development of the Cardano blockchain. Intersect plays a pivotal role in bringing together companies, developers, individuals, and other ecosystem participants. 

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Interim constitution --------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/interim-constitution)

![Image 14](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)[interim constitution](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=interim%20constitution)

The Interim Constitution serves as an initial governance framework, providing necessary guardrails and a foundational structure that the Cardano community can develop further. It sets the stage for the community-led workshops to be held worldwide throughout 2024, and the larger convention planned for Buenos Aires later in the year. 

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Governance tools ----------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/governance-tools)

![Image 15](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)[Governance tools](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Governance%20tools)

Governance tools are indispensable in a truly decentralized blockchain like Cardano. These tools foster collaboration and democratic consent, aligning core principles, processes, organizations, and mechanisms. Voltaire’s developmental roadmap has prioritized governance tooling to create greater efficiencies and provide new avenues for community involvement ...

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Governance action -----------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/governance-action)

![Image 16](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)[Governance action](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Governance%20action)

A governance action is a proposal that gets submitted on-chain for voting. It is an on-chain event triggered by a transaction. Governance actions have an expiration period, after which the action cannot be enacted. Any ada holder can submit a governance action for a vote on-chain. Once the action is recorded on the ledger, voters submit voting transactions...

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Delegated representatives (DReps) ---------------------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/delegate-representatives-dreps)

![Image 17](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)[Delegate representatives (DReps)](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Delegate%20representatives%20(DReps))

Delegated representatives (DReps) are a new role introduced in the age of Voltaire as part of the governance model proposed under CIP-1694. DReps, stake pool operators, and the constitutional committee are responsible for voting on governance actions. Any ada holder can register as a DRep. DReps will play a crucial role in the decision-making process within...

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Constitutional convention -------------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/constitutional-convention)

![Image 18](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)[Constitutional convention](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Constitutional%20convention)

The Cardano Constitutional Convention event occurred in Buenos Aires and Nairobi, in December 2024 as part of the journey toward a ratified Cardano constitution. Constitutional conventions exist to discuss and define a draft constitution, which will be proposed for an on-chain vote. A historical parallel for 2024's Cardano Constitutional Convention can be ...

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Constitutional committee ------------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/constitutional-committee)

![Image 19](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)[Constitutional committee](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Constitutional%20committee)

The Constitutional Committee (CC) is one of the three groups responsible for ratifying governance actions under CIP-1694 alongside SPOs and DReps. CIP-1694 defines the CC as a committee that represents a set of individuals or entities that are collectively responsible for ensuring that the constitution's principles are upheld and enforced. As described in C...

0 up votes and 0 down votes. Total score Upvote this 0 Downvote this 0

[Cardano constitution --------------------](https://www.essentialcardano.io/glossary/cardano-constitution)

![Image 20](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/158074695?v=4)

Emmanuel 08/12/2024

[Cardano constitution](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Cardano%20constitution)[Voltaire](https://www.essentialcardano.io/search?tags=Voltaire)

The Cardano constitution serves as the embodiment of the guiding principles for the operation and governance of the decentralized Cardano blockchain ecosystem, providing a foundation that will adapt and evolve over time to meet the continuing needs of the Cardano community. All members of the Cardano community are expected to abide by this constitution, and ...
